        public Jwt decode(String idToken,
                  String nonce)
           throws JwtVerificationException
        Description copied from interface: IdTokenVerifier
        Validates the given idToken. Validates this token is valid Okta id token that has not expired.
        Specified by:
        decode in interface IdTokenVerifier
        Parameters:
        idToken - string JWT id token to validate
        nonce - ID Token nonce - nullable
        Returns:
        a decoded JWT
        Throws:
